item.title: Colourfull yell,please help!
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

May be the colors arent defined in your client. Im sure its defined somewhere in client.java ( client sided)

Not sure, adding this would work you need to define many things i think. Nvm i have this in client.java:

	private static String combatDiffColor(int i, int j)
	{
		int k = i - j;
		if(k < -9)
			return "@red@";
		if(k < -6)
			return "@or3@";
		if(k < -3)
			return "@or2@";
		if(k < 0)
			return "@or1@";
		if(k > 9)
			return "@gre@";
		if(k > 6)
			return "@gr3@";
		if(k > 3)
			return "@gr2@";
		if(k > 0)
			return "@gr1@";
		else
			return "@yel@";
	}

Read full topic

They all say like @yel@[moderator] When i yell ingame

titles = @yel@ "[Moderator]-";

That just gave 100 errors lol
It dont work though.

item.title: Colourfull yell,please help!
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

[quote=“P R 0 Rusher, post:2, topic:368511”][quote author=pasta186 link=topic=464659.msg3397935#msg3397935 date=1289644107]
Hey all,
So recently i decided that i wanted my yell to be colourfull
This is my yell code::

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = "";
if (playerRights == 4) {
titles = "[Player]-";
} 
if (playerRights == 0) {
titles = "[Player]-";
}
 if (donator == 1) {
 titles = "@red@[Donator]@red@-";
}
if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = "[Moderator]-";
} 
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = "[Admin]-";
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = "[CO-OWNER]-";
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Harry")) {
titles = "[OWNER&CODER]-";
}
yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
+ command.substring(5));
}

So,when i am donator i do yell and it goes @red@[Donator]@red@ instead of actually making it red

This is what i have tried::

titles = "@red@[Donator]@red@-";
titles = "@red@[Donator]-";
titles = "[Donator]@red@-";

None of them work though!
Please can someone help me with this,it would be greatly appreciated.
[/quote]

Try to do it like this
[@red@donator@red@][/quote]

No.

Do it like this.

Example.

titles = "@yel@[Moderator]-";

Read full topic

item.title: Colourfull yell,please help!
item.dc:creator: @P_R_0_Rusher P R 0 Rusher
item.description:
@P_R_0_Rusher wrote:

[quote=“pasta186, post:1, topic:368511”]Hey all,
So recently i decided that i wanted my yell to be colourfull
This is my yell code::

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = "";
if (playerRights == 4) {
titles = "[Player]-";
} 
if (playerRights == 0) {
titles = "[Player]-";
}
 if (donator == 1) {
 titles = "@red@[Donator]@red@-";
}
if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = "[Moderator]-";
} 
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = "[Admin]-";
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = "[CO-OWNER]-";
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Harry")) {
titles = "[OWNER&CODER]-";
}
yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
+ command.substring(5));
}

So,when i am donator i do yell and it goes @red@[Donator]@red@ instead of actually making it red

This is what i have tried::

titles = "@red@[Donator]@red@-";
titles = "@red@[Donator]-";
titles = "[Donator]@red@-";

None of them work though!
Please can someone help me with this,it would be greatly appreciated.[/quote]

Try to do it like this
[@red@donator@red@]

item.title: Colourfull yell,please help!
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

Hey all,
So recently i decided that i wanted my yell to be colourfull
This is my yell code::

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = "";
if (playerRights == 4) {
titles = "[Player]-";
} 
if (playerRights == 0) {

if (playerRights == 1) {

So,when i am donator i do yell and it goes @red@[Donator]@red@ instead of actually making it red
